ygData.subject: Re: Looking For Game
ygData.msgSnippet: I was browsing through the games on AOL that you could download, and Gladiator is one of them! The game is Shareware, but if anyone wants it, email me at

I was browsing through the games on AOL that you could download, and 
Gladiator is one of them! The game is Shareware, but if anyone wants 
it, email me at Gmandaonly1@... As for Openglad, thank you for 
the suggestion. Its just like the old-school gladiator I remember!

--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "Shigeki Miyake-Stoner" 
<shigekims@c...> wrote:
> I actually have the original DOS based copy, on a laptop I loaned 
someone,
> so in due time I might beable to send it to you.
> 
> -shig
> 
> -----Original Message-----
> From: David Lowry [mailto:heedling@y...]
> Sent: Friday, August 08, 2003 8:09 PM
> To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [gladiator] Looking For Game
> 
> 
> Check out http://snowstorm.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/site.cgi for 
OpenGlad,
> which is basically the same game with win support and such.  As for 
the real
> original game..well.. I personally don't know of any sources that 
have it,
> (I lost my folder with Glad and the manual a long time ago, still 
haven't
> managed to find it) but somebody else in this group might, so hang 
in there.
> Or maybe OpenGlad is better than what you hoped for.
> 
> gmandaonly1 <gmandaonly1@y...> wrote:I have been looking for this 
game
> for a long time. It seems that
> forgotten sages is gone. Can anyone here tell me where I can get a
